FAQ.Question: Is this course only theoretical?
FAQ.Answer: No. It combines understanding with real-life application and reflection.

FAQ.Question: Can I start with zero knowledge of Aqeedah?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. The course is designed for absolute beginners.

FAQ.Question: Is Aqeedah difficult to understand?
FAQ.Answer: No. It is taught clearly with examples, reflection, and guidance.

FAQ.Question: Will I be able to understand and apply Aqeedah confidently?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Step-by-step guidance ensures comprehension and practical application.

FAQ.Question: How are misconceptions corrected?
FAQ.Answer: With clear guidance, examples, and patient explanation.
